insights: End-of-session cleanup must produce evidence: refreshed passdown, posted devlog, and Swarm Brain entry to avoid stall recovery loops.
Automated templates reduce friction and keep artifacts consistent across cycles.
Mapping deliverables to SSOT locations (passdown, devlog, Swarm Brain entry) improves observability for Captain review.
patterns: Session cleanup bundle: passdown.json + devlog (Discord posted) + Swarm Brain entry + helper tooling for repeatability.
Track outstanding deployment gates explicitly (e.g., WordPress window with Agent-1) to prevent hidden blockers.
actions: Updated passdown.json with session cleanup status, artifacts, and next-session priorities.
Authored and posted final session cleanup devlog to Discord.
Added session_cleanup_helper utility to pre-seed cleanup artifacts for future cycles.
